message.content:
I need to identify the carrying amount of inventories sold during the reporting period from the income statement.

Looking at the income statement, this value is typically represented by the "Cost of Goods Sold" line item, which represents the cost of inventory that was sold during the period.

In the provided income statement, I can see:
- Cost of Goods Sold: 13100000.00 (dated 2024-02-05)

This is the carrying amount of inventories sold during the reporting period.

```json
{"solution": {'value': '13100000.00'}}
```
